name: V-Rod Muscle
snippet: It sends massive horsepower and low-end torque directly to your adrenal gland when you unleash the engine. The V-Rod Muscle® motorcycle doesn't stutter when it makes its statement.

name: Roadster
snippet: The new Roadster™ motorcycle combines stoplight-to-stoplight power, agility and garage-built custom style to shatter every mold.

name: Iron 883
snippet: Aggressive throwback styling taken to a place altogether new. No need to shine this machine. Just get on and tear up the nearest street.
